name: HELPLESS ZOMBIES
description: Fascinating puzzle game that rethinks the gameplay, but retains the spirit of the legendary classic games such as Binary Land, Clu Clu Land and Adventures of Lolo.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows  7/8/10 Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 256MB of video RAM Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows  7/8/10 Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 512MB of video RAM Storage: 50 MB available space
